Wisdom: إِنَّ مَنْ أَعْطَى مَنْ حَرَمَهُ وَوَصَلَ مَنْ قَطَعَهُ وَعَفَى عَمَّنْ ظَلَمَهُ كَانَ لَهُ مِنَ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ الظَّهِيرُ وَالنَّصِيرُ
enWisdom: Verily, he who gives to the one who deprives him, establishes ties with the one who cuts him off and forgives the one who oppresses him, will find in Allah, the Glorified, a Supporter and a Helper

Wisdom: كُنْ لِمَنْ قَطَعَكَ وَاصِلًا وَلِمَنْ سَأَلَكَ مُعْطِياً وَلِمَنْ سَكَتَ عَنْ مَسْأَلَتِكَ مُبْتَدِئاً
enWisdom: Establish ties with the one who cuts you off, give the one who asks you, and initiate in giving to the one who does not ask from you
Sometimes [certain] ties may result in heavy burdens [and obligations]
Many ties are better to cut off than to keep

Wisdom: صِلُوا الَّذِي بَيْنَكُمْ وَبَيْنَ اللَّهِ تَسْعَدُوا
enWisdom: Attach yourselves to the one who is between you and Allah, [and] you will be felicitous

Wisdom: صَلِ الَّذِي بَيْنَكَ وَبَيْنَ اللَّهِ تَسْعَدْ بِمُنْقَلَبِكَ
enWisdom: Establish your bond with the one who is between you and Allah, [and] you will be felicitous in your final place of return [in the Hereafter]

Wisdom: عَلَيْكُمْ بِالتَّوَاصُلِ وَالْمُوَافَقَةِ وَإِيَّاكُمْ وَالْمُقَاطَعَةَ وَالْمُهَاجَرَةَ
enWisdom: Establish ties [with each other] and come to agreements, and beware of severing ties and forsaking one another
Being connected [and keeping ties] with the people of excellence leads to loftiness

Wisdom: وَصُولُ النَّاسِ مَنْ وَصَلَ مَنْ قَطَعَهُ
enWisdom: The one who consociates with the people is he who establishes ties with the one who cuts him off
